snippet: A former Con Ed worker turned rapper shows up at a rally of locked-out workers and performs a song whose lyrics seem written just for them.
abstract: A former Con Ed worker turned rapper shows up at a rally of locked-out workers and performs a song whose lyrics seem written just for them.

headline.main: At Con Ed Rally, an Ex-Worker Raps in Solidarity
headline.print_headline: At Labor Rally, Ex-Worker Returns to Rap in Solidarity
